comment: Tried talking to upper management and the HOA rep today in a meeting about officer precautions with the virus.
Stuff like, less handshakes and face to face times. No more accepting random packages. More wipes and soaps...
"Hmmm, no, we really can't cut corners on our services, sorry. We need to provide the absolute best client services at all time, rain, shine, or virus. Just tell your guys to wash their hands more."
Also, classes are cancelled for another week while professors turn their classes into online classes.
Same thing happened here for my school
We just started a new trimester and couldnâ€™t finish the first week
100% some courses are gonna suffer in a bad way. Especially the tech ones.
Unfortunately my school is an engineering school

English, maths, sciences, they'll be fine. But my CCL tech courses, I can't think of any of them even being remotely feasible because the classes revolved around our hardware and software only available on campus

(I finished my CCL last year, so I'm good personally, but still...)
